description: New details are emerging that link a suspected transnational drug trafficking ring allegedly run by a wanted Olympian to an April homicide in Ontario. An affidavit filed by a Toronto police officer assigned to the fugitive squad says evidence collected from the cellphone of a suspected ring member shows how the group orchestrated the man’s […]
title: Court Docs Link Olympian’s Alleged Drug Trafficking Ring to Ontario Homicide

description: The United States approved the arms deal with Taiwan, which includes radar upgrades and the first advanced surface-to-air missile system.
title: US Greenlights $2 Billion Arms Deal With Taiwan, Featuring Advanced Missile Defense

description: A Toronto lawyer couple have each been given 30 days in jail after former clients say at least $5.4 million is missing. Nicholas Cartel and Singa Bui were sentenced on Oct. 25 for contempt of court after months of not complying with court orders to hand over documents and attend court sessions. The two have […]
title: Toronto Lawyer Couple Sentenced to Jail for Contempt After Clients Say Over $6.5 Million Missing

description: MEXICO CITY—At least 24 people died and five others were injured when a bus crashed on a highway in Mexico’s central state of Zacatecas on Saturday, local authorities said. The accident occurred in the early morning hours when the bus carrying the victims collided with the back of a tractor-trailer carrying corn. Zacatecas Governor David […]
title: Two Dozen People Die in Bus Crash in Central Mexico

description: MOSCOW—A Mi-2 helicopter crashed in Russia’s central Kirov region on Saturday, killing all four people on board, emergency officials reported. The helicopter, operated by one pilot and carrying a doctor and two paramedics, crashed in a forest near the village of Beleenki, about 700 kilometers (435 miles) east of Moscow, according to an online statement […]
title: Helicopter Carrying Medical Workers Crashes in Central Russia, Killing All 4 People on Board

description: BRICS currently accounts for 45 percent of the world's population and 35 percent of world’s economy in terms of purchasing power.
title: China, Russia Aim to Use BRICS to Challenge Global Financial System—Experts Say It Won’t Work

description: Polish authorities say four people have been charged in an alleged plan to send explosives via courier service to Canada and the United States. The RCMP says it is aware of the arrests, but declined further comment to preserve the integrity of the investigation. The Polish group’s alleged activities apparently involved sending camouflaged explosives to […]
title: Poland Arrests People in Alleged Plot to Send Explosives to Canada

description: A veteran Ottawa journalist is firing back against what he says are “entirely false” claims by a former Conservative cabinet minister that he acted as a Russian agent. David Pugliese, a reporter with the Ottawa Citizen, said in a statement posted to X Friday that the claims Chris Alexander made at a House of Commons […]
title: Journalist Says Claims That He Is a Russian Agent Are ‘Fabricated’

description: British Columbians are awaiting the final tally of last week’s razor-thin provincial election, with several ridings that could determine the next government still hanging in the balance. Election BC says counting of the more than 66,000 mail-in ballots gets underway today and is expected to be completed by late Sunday. Meanwhile, the elections authority will […]
title: Final Count Begins in Razor-Thin Provincial Election in British Columbia

description: The Alberta government is warning that aspects of a federal pandemic prevention bill before Parliament encroach on the province’s constitutional jurisdiction, posing a particular threat to its agricultural industry. Alberta Agriculture and Irrigation Minister RJ Sigurdson told a press conference Bill C-293, the Pandemic Prevention and Preparedness Act, “singles out” the agricultural industry and would […]
title: Alberta Warns Federal Pandemic Prevention Bill Could ‘Devastate’ Agricultural Sector

description: The incumbent Labor government saw an overall 6 percent swing against it, ending its time in government after 3 terms.
title: ‘Tomorrow We Get to Work’: Centre-Right LNP Ends Decade of Labor Government in Queensland

description: The U.S. government has assessed that as many as 3,000 North Korean troops have arrived in Russia in recent weeks.
title: What North Korean Involvement Could Mean for the Russia–Ukraine War

description: South Africa’s demand that Taiwan move its diplomatic office out of Pretoria as China ratchets up pressure on partners to isolate Taiwan, a key U.S. ally.
title: US Lawmakers Accuse South Africa of ‘Bullying’ Taiwan, Warn of Consequences

description: A Hamas commander killed this week who led one part of the Oct. 7 massacre was also an employee of the UN's agency for Palestine, Israel's army says.
title: Hamas Terrorist in Oct. 7 Attack Worked for UNRWA, Israel Says

description: Canadian public sector jobs increased by 13 percent during the COVID-19 pandemic while the private and self-employed sectors saw just 3.6 percent growth, says a new report. “Canada’s net job creation in recent years has been disproportionately driven by growth in government employment rather than growth in the private sector,” said Ben Eisen, Fraser Institute […]
title: Gov’t Jobs Increased 13%, Three Times Private, in COVID-19 Pandemic: Report

description: Including Taiwan in INTERPOL will help the world combat increasingly advanced transnational crime.
title: Help Taiwan Help the World to Become a Safer Place
